metadata.title: CVE-2022-26373 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Non-transparent sharing of return predictor targets between contexts insome Intel(R) Processors may allow an authorized user to potentially enableinformation disclosure via local access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1090.97').
